text:
ALICE

(jumping the gun to have some fun)

how did I become
#distorted Alice
"Drink me" it said
on the side of the chalice,
& I, driven by
#earth's silent thrum,
decided to feed my head.

#atreyasverse #AliceInWonderland #feedyourhead #poetry
